org.dspace.content.dao

Interface ItemDAO

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DSpaceObjectDAO<Item>, DSpaceObjectLegacySupportDAO<Item>, GenericDAO<Item>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ItemDAOImpl

    public interface ItemDAO
extends DSpaceObjectLegacySupportDAO<Item>
    Database Access Object interface class for the Item object. The implementation of this class is responsible for all database calls for the Item object and is autowired by spring This class should only be accessed from a single service & should never be exposed outside of the API
    Author:
    kevinvandevelde at atmire.com
